categories.title: Technical Updates and Cyberpunk Racing Project in Hyperfy

content.text:
### Technical Discussions & Problem-Solving
- **Octree Errors Fixed:** Fire particles scaling to zero caused excessive subdivisions, impacting performance. Removing them resolved the issue.
- **Portal Update:** A new update allows switching between set and manual modes.
- **Server Performance Issues:** Switching from a Hetzner US server to an Oregon-based server improved performance.
- **Camera Manager App:** A new app with Follow, Orbit, and Static modes was introduced.
- **MCP Usage for Mobs:** Mobs can now equip weapons and attack players.
- **Car Physics Development:** A basic car system using raycasts for wheel positioning was built but lacks colliders.
- **Jetpack Prototype:** A prototype exists but needs further development.
- **NPC Spawning & Despawning:** A system for NPC spawning and despawning is in progress.
- **App Marketplace Testing:** A new version of the app marketplace is being tested before deployment.

### Cyberpunk-Themed World Project
- **Project Overview:** A large-scale Hyperfy project featuring a city racing track, multiplayer car racing, and AI integration.
- **Workgroup Channel Created:** A dedicated channel was set up for collaboration.
- **Car Sound Design:** A team member is working on sound design for the vehicles.
- **Time Trial Feature:** A planned feature for the racing track.
- **Multiplayer Racing:** A key feature of the project.
- **Documentation & Tutorials:** Plans to document the project for tutorials.

### Action Items
#### Technical Tasks
1. Fix car physics by adding colliders.
2. Refine NPC spawning/despawning system.
3. Implement a ping window in /stats.
4. Optimize server performance for Hyperfy worlds.
5. Finalize jetpack functionality.
6. Improve drone functionality after core update.
7. Test and deploy the new app marketplace.
8. Develop a multiplayer car racing system.
9. Enhance MCP mobs with better AI and combat mechanics.
10. Investigate AI-driven texture adjustments for buildings.

#### Documentation Needs
11. Document Camera Manager app usage.
12. Create a guide for setting up Caddy vs. Traefik.
13. Write a tutorial on MCP-based mob creation.
14. Document best practices for Hyperfy server deployment.
15. Provide a guide on integrating AI-generated textures.

#### Feature Requests
16. Add a free cam drone mode.
17. Enable AI-driven scene-based texture adjustments.
18. Develop a solid car physics system for racing.
19. Improve time cycle mechanics for dynamic worlds.
20. Expand multiplayer functionality for racing and combat.
